other_tests.findings: Bilateral microcornea, microphthalmos, congenital membranous cataracts, and persistent pupillary membranes. Corneal diameter was 8 mm in both eyes. Axial lens (AL) was 16.93 mm in the right eye and 16.68 mm in the left eye. Intraocular pressure (IOP) was 16 mmHg in the right eye and 12 mmHg in the left eye. The P2 latency of visual evoked potential was delayed in both eyes.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Severe posterior capsular opacification was noted in the right eye at the three-month follow-up after cataract surgery. A second surgery was prescribed to remove the opacities.

other_tests.findings: Increased blood pressure in the intracranial artery.
Identified a c.178_182del variant in RAB3GAP1 and a deletion in chromosome 2q21.3, both classified as likely pathogenic.
